document_data.name: Shards of Selûne
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Shards of Selûne''''' were three [[magic]]ally enchanted [[gem]]stones that were blessed by the [[god]]dess [[Selûne]].{{Cite dungeon/193/Shards of Selûne|21}}
document_data.Description: The gems shone with a bright moonlight.
document_data.Abilities: The gems were powerful objects that possessed holy powers. Although the gems could not harm them, [[plaguechanged]] creatures feared the powers of the gems and usually shun them, as the gems caused great pain to any plaguechanged creatures that touched them.{{Cite dungeon/193/Shards of Selûne|37}}
document_data.History:
In [[1479 DR]], when the goddess Selûne gazed upon Neverwinter, she despaired while seeing the tribulations of the city and its inhabitants. She shed three tears, that became gems and fell in the city like shooting stars. Lady [[Jasmine (priest)|Jasmine]], the head priestess of Selûne in Neverwinter, recognized the shards as a sign from her goddess and tasked a group of [[adventurer]]s to retrieve the gems.

The gems were later used to purify the [[Shard of Night]] and re-consecrate it to the goddess.{{Cite dungeon/193/Shards of Selûne|42}}
